dialogue.string: 1�Leave  �[Leujaoam Sanctum/the Mamool Ja Training Grounds/Lebros Cavern/Periqia/Ilrusi Atoll]?Yes.No.
1�Are you one of the mercenaries sent to retrieve the Mark-IIs? We've been waiting for you.
1�Listen carefully, for this mission is not as simple as it may seem. The battle automaton Mark-II, a.k.a. Maymun, is a very...unique model.
1�To prevent usage by enemy forces in the event of capture, the machines have been programmed to only respond to specific gestures.
1�In other words, you must use body language to communicate with them.
1�Our scouts have confirmed a total of six Mark-IIs in the area.
1�To complete your mission, you must retrieve at least four.
1�If you have any questions, feel free to ask.
1�What would you like to know about?Mission objectives.Maymun commands.Maymun personality.Current number retrieved.Nothing.
1�Your orders are as follows:
1�1. Retrieve at least four Mark-II automatons and lead them back to headquarters.
1�2. /salute to activate the Maymun and register as its ??master.??3. Wave /goodbye to deactivate it.
1�4. /clap to initiate ??follow?? mode.5. A /hurray gesture will switch on/off ??battle?? mode.
1�6. The Maymun will not accept orders from a ??master?? who is currently controlling another Mark-II.
1�To maintain control of the Maymun, you will need to respond correctly to its unique gestures.
1�Learn about which gestures?Bowing.Pointing.Waving.Dancing.Blushing.Saluting.Happy.Confused.Shocked.Praising.Clapping.Cheering.Quit.
1�When the Mark-II bows, you should politely /kneel before her.
1�When the Mark-II wanders astray, you should tell her /no.
1�When the Mark-II waves her hand, you should /welcome her.
1�When the Mark-II dances, you should express your /joy.
1�When the Mark-II is pretending to act embarrassed, you should ignore her by pretending to /doze off.
1�When the Mark-II salutes, you should /praise her.
1�When the Mark-II is happy, you should /smile.
1�When the Mark-II is confused, you should /slap her lightly to realign her circuitry.
1�When the Mark-II is in shock, you should /comfort her.
1�When the Mark-II praises you, you should /blush.
1�When the Mark-II applauds, you should become /angry with her.
1�If the Mark-II cheers, you should /psyche up.
1�There are six different personality programs used in the Mark-II models.
1�The violent ??Diemun??...The hyperactive ??Flymun??...The carefree ??Highmun??...
1�The sensitive ??Crymun??...The peaceful ??Whymun??...And...
1�The basic ??Maymun?? model.Oh, and those names aren't official. I've simply had a lot of free time waiting out here for you mercenaries to come along.
1�You still haven't brought me any...

1�You have retrieved 
� Mark-II?�[/s] so far.
